verses.t: Therefore{G1352} thou art{G1488} inexcusable{G379}, O{G5599} man{G444}, whosoever thou art{G3956} that judgest{G2919}: for{G1063} wherein{G1722} thou judgest{G2919} another{G2087}, thou condemnest{G2632} thyself{G4572}; for{G1063} thou that judgest{G2919} doest{G4238} the same things{G846}.
But{G1161} we are sure{G1492} that{G3754} the judgment{G3588} of God{G3588} is{G2076} according to{G2596} truth{G225} against{G1909} them which commit{G4238} such things{G5108}.

And{G1161} thinkest thou{G3049} this{G5124}, O{G5599} man{G444}, that judgest{G2919} them which do{G4238} such things{G5108}, and{G2532} doest{G4160} the same{G846}, that{G3754} thou{G4771} shalt escape{G1628} the judgment{G3588} of God{G3588}?

Or{G2228} despisest thou{G2706} the riches{G3588} of his{G846} goodness{G3588} and{G2532} forbearance{G3588} and{G2532} longsuffering{G3588}; not knowing{G50} that{G3754} the goodness{G5543} of God{G3588} leadeth{G71} thee{G4571} to{G1519} repentance{G3341}?

But{G1161} after{G2596} thy{G4675} hardness{G3588} and{G2532} impenitent{G279} heart{G2588} treasurest up{G2343} unto thyself{G4572} wrath{G3709} against{G1722} the day{G2250} of wrath{G3709} and{G2532} revelation{G602} of the righteous judgment{G1341} of God{G3588};
Who{G3739} will render{G591} to every man{G1538} according to{G2596} his{G846} deeds{G3588}:
To them{G3588} who by{G2596} patient continuance{G5281} in well{G18} doing{G2041} seek for{G2212} glory{G1391} and{G2532} honour{G5092} and{G2532} immortality{G861}, eternal{G166} life{G2222}:
But{G1161} unto them{G3588} that are contentious{G2052}, and{G2532} do not obey{G544} the truth{G3588}, but{G1161} obey{G3982} unrighteousness{G3588}, indignation{G2372} and{G2532} wrath{G3709},

Tribulation{G2347} and{G2532} anguish{G4730}, upon{G1909} every{G3956} soul{G5590} of man{G444} that doeth{G2716} evil{G2556}, of the Jew{G2453} first{G4412}, and{G5037} also{G2532} of the Gentile{G1672};
But{G1161} glory{G1391}, honour{G5092}, and{G2532} peace{G1515}, to every man{G3956} that worketh{G2038} good{G18}, to the Jew{G2453} first{G4412}, and{G5037} also{G2532} to the Gentile{G1672}:
For{G1063} there is{G2076} no{G3756} respect of persons{G4382} with{G3844} God{G3588}.

For{G1063} as many as{G3745} have sinned{G264} without law{G460} shall{G622} also{G2532} perish{G622} without law{G460}: and{G2532} as many as{G3745} have sinned{G264} in{G1722} the law{G3551} shall be judged{G2919} by{G1223} the law{G3551};
(For{G1063} not{G3756} the hearers{G3588} of the law{G3588} are just{G1342} before{G3844} God{G3588}, but{G235} the doers{G3588} of the law{G3588} shall be justified{G1344}.

For{G1063} when{G3752} the Gentiles{G1484}, which have{G2192} not{G3361} the law{G3551}, do{G4160} by nature{G5449} the things{G3588} contained in the law{G3588}, these{G3778}, having{G2192} not{G3361} the law{G3551}, are{G1526} a law{G3551} unto themselves{G1438}:

Which{G3748} shew{G1731} the work{G3588} of the law{G3588} written{G1123} in{G1722} their{G846} hearts{G3588}, their{G846} conscience{G3588} also bearing witness{G4828}, and{G2532} their thoughts{G3588} the mean while{G3342} accusing{G2723} or else{G2228} excusing{G626} one another{G240};)
In{G1722} the day{G2250} when{G3753} God{G3588} shall judge{G2919} the secrets{G2927} of men{G3588} by{G1223} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} according to{G2596} my{G3450} gospel{G3588}.Tag 5 has no Gk?
Behold{G1492}, thou{G4771} art called{G2028} a Jew{G2453}, and{G2532} restest{G1879} in the law{G3588}, and{G2532} makest thy boast{G2744} of{G1722} God{G2316},
And{G2532} knowest{G1097} his will{G3588}, and{G2532} approvest{G1381} the things that are more excellent{G1308}, being instructed{G2727} out of{G1537} the law{G3588};
And{G5037} art confident that{G3982} thou thyself{G4572} art{G1511} a guide{G3595} of the blind{G5185}, a light{G5457} of them{G3588} which are in{G1722} darkness{G4655},
An instructor{G3810} of the foolish{G878}, a teacher{G1320} of babes{G3516}, which hast{G2192} the form{G3588} of knowledge{G3588} and{G2532} of the truth{G3588} in{G1722} the law{G3588}.

Thou{G3588} therefore{G3767} which teachest{G1321} another{G2087}, teachest thou{G1321} not{G3756} thyself{G4572}? thou that preachest{G2784} a man should not{G3361} steal{G2813}, dost thou steal{G2813}?
Thou that sayest{G3004} a man should not{G3361} commit adultery{G3431}, dost thou commit adultery{G3431}? thou that abhorrest{G948} idols{G3588}, dost thou commit sacrilege{G2416}?
Thou that{G3739} makest thy boast{G2744} of{G1722} the law{G3551}, through{G1223} breaking{G3588} the law{G3588} dishonourest thou{G818} God{G3588}?
For{G1063} the name{G3686} of God{G3588} is blasphemed{G987} among{G1722} the Gentiles{G3588} through{G1223} you{G5209}, as{G2531} it is written{G1125}.

For{G1063} circumcision{G4061} verily{G3303} profiteth{G5623}, if{G1437} thou keep{G4238} the law{G3551}: but{G1161} if{G1437} thou be{G1510} a breaker{G3848} of the law{G3551}, thy{G4675} circumcision{G3588} is made{G1096} uncircumcision{G203}.

Therefore{G3767} if{G1437} the uncircumcision{G3588} keep{G5442} the righteousness{G3588} of the law{G3588}, shall not{G3780} his{G846} uncircumcision{G3588} be counted{G3049} for{G1519} circumcision{G4061}?

And{G2532} shall not{G2919} uncircumcision{G203} which is by{G1537} nature{G5449}, if it fulfil{G5055} the law{G3588}, judge{G2919} thee{G4571}, who{G3588} by{G1223} the letter{G1121} and{G2532} circumcision{G4061} dost transgress{G3848} the law{G3551}?
For{G1063} he{G3588} is{G2076} not{G3756} a Jew{G2453}, which is one{G3588} outwardly{G5318}; neither{G3761} is that circumcision{G4061}, which is outward{G5318} in{G1722} the flesh{G4561}:

But{G235} he{G3588} is a Jew{G2453}, which is one{G3588} inwardly{G2927}; and{G2532} circumcision{G4061} is that of the heart{G2588}, in{G1722} the spirit{G4151}, and not{G3756} in the letter{G1121}; whose{G3739} praise{G3588} is not{G3756} of{G1537} men{G444}, but{G235} of{G1537} God{G3588}.
